sense.gloss: spare moment, interval, break, pause, spare time
chink (in one's armor, armour), unpreparedness, carelessness
chink (in one's armor, armour), chance, opportunity, weak spot
person with a lot of free time on their hands, person of leisure, idler, loafer
draft, draught, cold air entering through the crack of a door or window
cooling off of a relationship, draft of cold air between two persons
to watch for an unguarded moment
one must constantly be on one's guard with ..., one cannot be too careful of ...
without any weak spot, watertight (e.g. reasoning), impeccable
before one could, in no time at all, without a gap

k_ele.e: 白駒の隙を過ぐるが如し

r_ele.r: はっくのげきをすぐるがごとし

sense.gloss: time flies, like watching a white horse run by through a gap in the wall (Zhuangzi)
to take advantage of one's carelessness, to perform a surprise attack

sdata.j: ↑雨↑↓あめ↓が↑屋根↑↓やね↓の↑隙間↑↓すきま↓からぽたぽた↑落↑↓お↓ちていた。
sdata.e: The rain was dripping through a leak in the roof.

sdata.j: ↑酷使↑↓こくし↓されている↑不法↑↓ふほう↓↑外国↑↓がいこく↓↑人↑↓じん↓↑労働↑↓ろうどう↓↑者↑↓しゃ↓は↑制度↑↓せいど↓の↑隙間↑↓すきま↓にこぼれ↑落↑↓お↓ちてしまうことが↑多↑↓おお↓いのです。
sdata.e: Mistreated illegal foreign workers often fall between the cracks of the social system.

sdata.j: ↑歯↑↓は↓が↑抜↑↓ぬ↓けて↑隙間↑↓すきま↓が↑空↑↓あ↓いていた。
↑男↑↓おとこ↓は↑壁↑↓かべ↓の↑隙間↑↓すきま↓からのぞいた。
sdata.e: The man peeped through a hole in the wall.

sdata.j: ↑犯人↑↓はんにん↓とその↑仲間↑↓なかま↓は↑目↑↓め↓を↑離↑↓はな↓した↑隙↑↓すき↓に↑逃↑↓に↓げ↑出↑↓だ↓した。
sdata.e: The criminal and his companions ran away while we took our eyes off.

sdata.j: ↑目↑↓め↓の↑前↑↓まえ↓で↑繰↑↓く↓り↑広↑↓ひろ↓げられるやり↑取↑↓と↓りは、↑俺↑↓おれ↓が↑入↑↓はい↓り↑込↑↓こ↓む↑隙↑↓すき↓なんて↑一↑↓いち↓ミリもない。
sdata.e: The exchange unfolding in front of my eyes had not a single millimetre of a gap in which for me to slip.

sdata.j: ↑油断↑↓ゆだん↓も↑隙↑↓すき↓もない↑奴↑↓やつ↓だ。
sdata.e: You can't let your guard down for a second around that guy.

sdata.j: トムさんは↑寸分↑↓すんぶん↓の↑隙間↑↓すきま↓のない↑紳士↑↓しんし↓でした。
sdata.e: Tom was every inch a gentleman.

sdata.j: トムが↑少↑↓すこ↓し↑席↑↓せき↓を↑離↑↓はな↓れた↑隙↑↓すき↓に、メアリーは↑彼↑↓かれ↓の↑教科書↑↓きょうかしょ↓に↑落書↑↓らくが↓きをした。
sdata.e: In the short time Tom was away from his desk, Mary scribbled something in his textbook.

sdata.j: カーテンの↑隙間↑↓すきま↓から↑光↑↓ひかり↓が↑差↑↓さ↓し↑込↑↓こ↓む。
sdata.e: Light flows in through a gap in the curtain.

sdata.j: トムはメアリーがお↑風呂↑↓ふろ↓に↑入↑↓はい↓ってる↑隙↑↓すき↓に、↑彼女↑↓かのじょ↓の↑日記↑↓にっき↓をこっそり↑読↑↓よ↓んだんだよ。
sdata.e: Tom secretly read Mary's diary while she was taking a bath.

sdata.j: トムったら↑私↑↓わたし↓が↑食卓↑↓しょくたく↓から↑離↑↓はな↓れてる↑隙↑↓すき↓に、↑私↑↓わたし↓のご↑飯↑↓はん↓つまみ↑食↑↓ぐ↓いしたのよ。
sdata.e: Tom ate some of my rice while I was away from the table.

sdata.j: あいつら、↑俺↑↓おれ↓が↑席↑↓せき↓を↑立↑↓た↓ってる↑隙↑↓すき↓に↑俺↑↓おれ↓が↑買↑↓か↓ってきた↑肉↑↓にく↓、↑全部↑↓ぜんぶ↓↑食↑↓く↓いやがった。
sdata.e: Not even a moment after leaving, those lot had already scoffed down all the meat I'd bought.

sdata.j: ↑部屋↑↓へや↓の↑換気扇↑↓かんきせん↓を↑回↑↓まわ↓すとドアの↑隙間↑↓すきま↓から↑冷↑↓つめ↓たい↑風↑↓かぜ↓が↑入↑↓はい↓り↑込↑↓こ↓んでくる。
sdata.e: When I turn the fan on in the room, a cool breeze comes in from under the door.
